lead_paragraph: A collection of documents from both sides of the debate on fetal tissue research shows the controversy surrounding the investigation and the science. The following documents include letters from members of Congress, letters from medical practitioners and email exchanges on tissue requests.

headline.main: Documents Related to Fetal Tissue Research Investigation

snippet: A collection of documents from both sides of the debate on fetal tissue research shows the controversy surrounding the investigation and the science. The following documents include letters from members of Congress, letters from medical practitioners and email exchanges on tissue requests.
